pr_title: KOGITO-1460 - Move Maven build to use version 3.6.0

timeline.bodyText: Those versions were added to the BOM?
timeline.author: ricardozanini

replies.bodyText: I think it's default when you bump maven version
replies.author: evacchi

replies.bodyText: guys I think this might bite us if we don't add the mvnw and/or the enforcer plugin like Quarkus did. The reason why e.g. surefire version in particular is overridden is that otherwise Quarkus tests won't work as expected. Reason I am saying this, it happened to me, I was running an older version of maven, with their default versions and couldn't realize it wasn't working.
replies.author: evacchi

replies.bodyText: @evacchi having the version in the pluginmanagement would enforce that specific version to be used. Plus adding the required Maven version I think makes sense, also to make sure we run on the same setup as jenkins. Could you look into that?
replies.author: cristianonicolai

replies.bodyText: sure, just a heads up: plugin management won't work with bom import AFAIK https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MNG-5588 🙈
replies.author: evacchi
